item.description:
Have you ever wondered about the oneness of creation? The oneness of God and the universe? Have you ever felt yourself to be part of the expansive oneness of life? Come hear Mother Clare speak of the amazing reality of the universal field of being which includes everyone and everything created by God. Let your heart and mind open to the wonder of this spiritual truth and be changed

 

Saturday, April 21, 10 am ~2 pm
Suggested Donation $35, (Light lunch available by donation) Bring a Friend for Free!

 

Mother Clare Watts is the co-director of a mystical Christian school and Order called the Order of Christ Sophia. She is an ordained Master Teacher and Priest, holding a Master’s Degree in Counseling Psychology with post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, and is a Certified Professional Midwife. She is also the author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path To Enlightenment. Watch her on YouTube.
item.name: The Matrix
